feed.title: I, Librarian Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for I, Librarian: 5.10.3
entry.content:
This is an open-source version of our SaaS at https://i-librarian.net. If you want to run this, you need PHP 7.4+.

Bug fixes

  • co-authors with the same name bug fix #87
  • advanced search with OR boolean glue bug fix
  • PDF viewer case insensitive search bug fix
  • misc. small improvements, and code changes

Linux

Distributable source (PHP 7.4+) Ubuntu console installer (Ubuntu 20.04+) Ubuntu deb (Ubuntu 20.04+)

Windows

64-bit installer with Apache 2.4 and PHP 8.1 (requires VS16 redistributable) 64-bit distributable source (PHP 7.4+)

Mac OS X

must install from Linux distributable source (PHP 7.4+)

Upgrading

To upgrade from version 5, simply install/overwrite over the previous version.

Migrating from 4.10

When you open the new I, Librarian for the first time, you will get a chance to migrate your existing library. The old library is copied to the new directory, so make sure you have enough space on your disk.

IMPORTANT After the migration had concluded, login to the new I, Librarian and go to Administrator > Databases & indexes and click Re-extract all PDFs. You should now have fully searchable I, Librarian 5.

entry.title: New release for I, Librarian: 5.10.4
entry.content:
This is an open-source version of our SaaS at https://i-librarian.net. If you want to run this, you need PHP 8.

Security vulnerabilities

  • stored XSS in dashboard was fixed by commit 187e5ff4f413047fb522a9ab24c3c42555d7cfe7
  • reflected XSS in advanced search was fixed by commit 3f2c64768a70fc0d529bc29d47bc706ecf26314e

responsibly reported by @7a6163

Bug fixes

  • improved compatibility with PHP 8.2
  • misc. small improvements, and obscure bug fixes

Linux

Distributable source (PHP 8+) Ubuntu console installer (Ubuntu 22.04+) Ubuntu deb (Ubuntu 22.04+)

Windows

64-bit installer with Apache 2.4 and PHP 8.1 (requires VS16 redistributable) 64-bit distributable source (PHP 8+)

Mac OS X

must install from Linux distributable source (PHP 8+)

Upgrading

To upgrade from version 5, simply install/overwrite over the previous version.

Migrating from 4.10

When you open the new I, Librarian for the first time, you will get a chance to migrate your existing library. The old library is copied to the new directory, so make sure you have enough space on your disk.

IMPORTANT After the migration had concluded, login to the new I, Librarian and go to Administrator > Databases & indexes and click Re-extract all PDFs. You should now have fully searchable I, Librarian 5.

entry.title: New release for I, Librarian: 5.11.0
entry.content:
This is an open-source version of our SaaS at https://i-librarian.net. If you want to run this, you need PHP 8.

New

  • small UI changes

Bug fixes

  • PDF viewer UTF-8 text extraction bug fixed
  • Pubmed and Crossref import improvements
  • improved security of supplementary file handling

Linux

Distributable source (PHP 8+) Ubuntu console installer (Ubuntu 22.04+) Ubuntu deb (Ubuntu 22.04+)

Windows

64-bit installer with Apache 2.4 and PHP 8.1 (requires VS16 redistributable) 64-bit distributable source (PHP 8+)

Mac OS X

must install from Linux distributable source (PHP 8+)

Upgrading

To upgrade from version 5, simply install/overwrite over the previous version.

Migrating from 4.10

When you open the new I, Librarian for the first time, you will get a chance to migrate your existing library. The old library is copied to the new directory, so make sure you have enough space on your disk.

IMPORTANT After the migration had concluded, login to the new I, Librarian and go to Administrator > Databases & indexes and click Re-extract all PDFs. You should now have fully searchable I, Librarian 5.
